quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Build something that a small number of users love, rather than a large number of users like.
author: Sam Altman

quote: Great products are built by teams who deeply understand their users' needs and pain points.
author: Marty Cagan

quote: When in doubt, always talk to a customer!
author: Arpit Jain

quote: Keep following up, always, with everyone
author: Arpit J

quote: The greatest danger of artificial intelligence is that people conclude too early that they understand it.
author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha
